MR Bargain
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): MR Bargain
By fiffa46 on Tuesday, October 12, 2004 - 03:52 pm:

I was at the local dollar store cause my wife was looking for a new coupon holder. Anyway, I saw a bunch of VHS tapes and figured I would take a look. Low and behold I find 3 different Monster Rancher tv series tapes. With 3 episodes on each I got 9 episodes for $3. WOOHOO :D
